description: American Marxist national daily online news publication (successor to the Daily Worker)
label: People's World
title: People's_World
exrest: People's World, official successor to the Daily Worker, is a Marxist and American leftist national daily online news publication. Founded by activists, socialists, communists, and those active in the labor movement in the early 1900s, the current publication is a result of a merger between the Daily World and the West Coast weekly paper People's Daily World in 1987.
exhtml: People's World, official successor to the Daily Worker, is a Marxist and American leftist national daily online news publication. Founded by activists, socialists, communists, and those active in the labor movement in the early 1900s, the current publication is a result of a merger between the Daily World and the West Coast weekly paper People's Daily World in 1987.
